name: Resilience by Madsure
description:
Peace Peace Peace

"Resilience" is Madsure's third full Instrumental LP which contains 13 tracks and was released digitally on September 4, 2021. But on January 24, 2022, it has been re-released in a deluxe edition. Madsure changed the album cover with a new one and added 4 tracks, which means the total is 17 Hip-hop Instrumental tracks with boom-bap vibes that are heavily infused with soul and jazz music samples.

To listen and buy Madsure's instrumental album, you can visit the Skeptical Records Bandcamp
https://skepticalrecords.bandcamp.com/album/resilience-deluxe-edition

This gif was made as a celebration of the re-release of the album Resilience by Madsure, thank you.

Peace
